sentences.sContent: His business rivals knew they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary.
sentences.sContent_eng: His business rivals knew they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary.
sentences.sCn: 他的业务对手都知道他们不能指望这样无情的对手的慈悲。

sentences.sContent: They tell us, sir, that we are weak -- unable to cope with so formidable an adversary.
sentences.sContent_eng: They tell us, sir, that we are weak -- unable to cope with so formidable an adversary.
sentences.sCn: 先生，他们告诉我们，我们是弱小的——不能应付如此强大的对手。

sentences.sContent: If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .
sentences.sContent_eng: If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .
sentences.sCn: 如果我们运用求幂运算来加密和解密，对手就可以运用对数进行攻击。

trans.tranOther: a country or person you are fighting or competing against
